ygData.subject: Re: Fighting and Creating
ygData.msgSnippet: Lady Hawk had to agree that her fathers ideas would be useless in space.  But isn t the ultimate challenge of every race to survive? To do so they must

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lady Hawk had to agree that her fathers ideas would be useless in space. "
But isn't the ultimate challenge of every race to survive? To do so they
must adapt." She hoped he'd follow her lead and complete her thoughts for
her. As royalty she hadn't been prerared for such a debate. "I've seen many
things in my time including creatures such as the ones you want me to create
that can survive even without an atmosphere." she searched her memory banks
for a quick example, "The voles of Tembre breathe the phosphorus gasses in
thier atmosphere like we use the air as coolant for our internal circuitry."
She knew he couldn't argue the example but he could push the issue. as much
as she despised what she'd have to do she knew that it was her main chance
at freedom. Even if it cost her her beliefs.

> ::Zardus::

> Zardus nods, listening to Lady Hawk's small speach and seeing the flaw

>
> "Combining DNA would be very useful for a conflict such as the one on
> this planet, yes," he says to her when she finishes talking, "But most
> bot affairs take place in space, where animals wouldn't survive. For
> that reason, I don't think that these engeneered bots will be the next
> generation of transformers."
>
